Summary A tech enthusiast passionate about solving real problems using creativity and technology. 9 years of product, engineering & research experience in building internet products.

Launched a few hobby projects/hacks, got adoption from hundred thousands of users and featured in TechCrunch, Mashable, ReadWriteWeb, etc.

Summary I am a seasoned product manager with a strong online advertising background and extensive experience with Ad Platforms, Analytics and Data Warehousing.  
 
As a Product Owner, I have led cross-functional teams in the US and abroad to build successful data-driven solutions in the areas of audience targeting, campaign measurement, cross-channel attribution, retail and financial reporting. I have built both back-end components and APIs, as well as front-end UIs, and have worked with Engineering organizations using waterfall and Agile SDLC.  
 
Specialties: Product Management, Product Marketing Management, Project Management, Partner Management, Online Advertising, Analytics, Data Warehousing, Targeting, ROI Measurement, APIs, Data Management Platforms, Data Onboarding, Agile, B2B, Rally, Jira, 3rd Party data, 1st Party data, Partner Integrations. Experience Senior Product Manager - Closed Loop Yahoo October 2012  – Present (2 years 11 months) Sunnyvale, CA Product Owner of Yahoo Closed Loop Advertising Solutions, a suite of Audience Targeting and Campaign Measurement products using 3rd Party data from various data providers and 1st party data from Yahoo advertisers.  
 
- Product and marketing lead for US and global data partnerships including Experian, Acxiom (US, LatAm, Europe, Asia), Datalogix (US, Europe), Nielsen, IXI, IMS, Nectar (Europe). Worked with Partners on a day-to-day basis to identify business opportunities and product ideas, create product backlogs, define go-to-market plans, build training and sales collateral and pilot new initiatives.  
 
- Product Manager for database matching and offline campaign measurement technologies (PII matching and ad exposure reporting), working with Engineering teams in Sunnyvale, London and Beijing; Operations teams in Omaha and NYC, and Sales teams across the US 
 
- Liaison to Business Development, Legal, Privacy and Data Governance, Operations, Marketing and Sales organizations for crafting partner contracts, validating product concepts with Privacy, creating operational cookbooks, business cases and sales pitches. 
 Senior Product Marketing Manager - Advertising Solutions Yahoo January 2008  –  October 2012  (4 years 10 months) Sunnyvale, CA Product owner of Yahoo Consumer Direct, an advertising solution for Consumer Packaged Goods brands that enables Purchase Based Targeting audiences on the Yahoo Display Ad Network and measures Offline Sales ROI. 
 
- Brought to market the first loyalty-card Purchase Based Targeting solution in market with Nielsen Catalina Solutions. Companies like AOL, Microsoft and DSPs have imitated Yahoo!’s steps and created alike products ever since. 
 
- Piloted Yahoo GRP Direct with Nielsen, a breakthrough advertising solution to create online TV audiences and optimize cross-platform (TV and digital) marketing campaigns 
 
- Designed the first version of Rule-Based Behavioral Targeting on Yahoo Apt (Guaranteed Media ad platform), to allow Publishers and Advertisers to define audiences based on their own data.
